dcterms:creator: René Dreos
Giovanna Ambrosini

dcterms:description: A comprehensive cross-species dataset of 150K unique promoter-gene sequences from 15 species, enriching resources for future generative modelling in genomics.
dcterms:title: Cross-species dataset of unique promoter-gene sequences

dcterms:creator: Patrick Meylan
René Dreos
Giovanna Ambrosini
Romain Groux
Philipp Bucher
dcterms:description: The Eukaryotic Promoter Database (EPDnew) provides organism-specific promoters annotated with downstream genes, transcription starting sites, and expression levels.
dcterms:title: Eukaryotic Promoter Database (EPDnew)
